Method Detail

newMdWrap

public MdWrap newMdWrap()
                 throws METSException
Return an empty mdWrap. The returned object has no properties or content and is not part of the METS document, it is essentially a constructor of a METS element which is owned by the METS document. The returned object needs to be "filled out" (e.g. with id, additional sub-elements, etc) before being added to the METS document.

Throws:
METSException

newMdRef

public MdRef newMdRef()
               throws METSException
Return an empty mdRef. The returned object has no properties or content and is not part of the METS document, it is essentially a constructor of a METS element which is owned by the METS document. The returned object needs to be "filled out" (e.g. with id, additional sub-elements, etc) before being added to the METS document.

Throws:
METSException
